content: SANTIAGO  Aug 25 The board of Enel Chile SA said on Friday that a plan it privately presented to Enel in July to absorb Enel Green Power Latin America's non-conventional renewable generation assets in Chile has been conditionally approved by the parent company.
name: Enel Chile SA
title: UPDATE 1-Enel seeks to shake up renewables ownership in Chile

content: * Enel - Board of directors of co's unit Enel Chile launched analysis of a possible corporate reorganisation of Enel group's shareholdings in Chile
name: Enel Chile SA
title: BRIEF-Enel says co's Chile unit launches analysis of corporate reorganisation in Chile

content: SANTIAGO  May 10 Electricity provider Enersis Chile projected investments of $1.6 billion over the next four years  mainly in generation activities  local newspaper Diario Financiero reported on Tuesday.
name: Enel Chile SA
title: Enersis Chile projects $1.6 bln investment over four years -paper
